events.message: I ordered a package two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't updated in days. Can you help?
The issue has been classified under 'Delivery Delay' based on the customer's report of late shipment and tracking problems.
The case has been assigned to a customer support representative specialized in shipping and delivery issues.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with the delay in your order. Could you please provide your order number?
To further investigate, could you please confirm the order number or any tracking details you have available?
Thanks for replying. My order number is 12345XYZ and the last update on the tracking was five days ago showing it left the sorting facility.
I've contacted the shipping carrier to check the current status. We expect an update within 48 hours and will keep you informed promptly.
Okay, I appreciate you looking into this so quickly. I'll wait for your update.
Good news! The carrier confirmed your package was delayed but is now en route for delivery tomorrow.
Just checking in to confirm that your package arrived as expected. Please let us know if everything is okay.
Yes, the package arrived today and everything is perfect. Thank you very much for your help!
We are closing your case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
